entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update NativeAOT Invoke exception handling #69336
  • `JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.Arm.AdvSimd` segfaults on ` mono llvmfullaot Pri0 Runtime Tests Run Linux arm64 release` #69330
  • Use NuGet Central Package Management in dotnet/runtime #69329
  • How do I export a function with a Callback argument for use in c? NativeAOT #69328
  • [Mono][Arm64]Improve the generated code for Vector128.Equals* on Arm64 #69325
    7.0.0
  • should expose the accumulative GC pause duration as a counter #69324
    7.0.0
  • Segmentation fault linux since net 6 upgrade #69323
  • Can the BlockingCollection<T>.GetConsumingEnumerable iterator be optimized? #69320
  • SslStream.AuthenticateAsClientAsync behaves wrong with TLS 1.3 #69315
  • .NET 6 strong name signing behavior breaks existing code. #69311
  • QPACK error during HTTP/3 stress #69310
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.NTAuthenticationTests.NtlmSignatureTest on Mono on MacCatalyst #69309
  • Undefined references when linking with libnethost.a #69306
  • [API Proposal]: Add ReadOnlySpan<char> overloads to System.Drawing.Graphics #69302
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix exception reason on evaluation of method that throws #69300
  • [wasm] [debugger] Evaluation of methods on enums #69299
  • Suboptimal Codegen for Vector128.AsVector128(Vector2) #69298
  • After upgrade .net core from 3.0 to 6.0, System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (10060) randomly shows up #69296
  • Regular crash in Exception.Source on ARM64 (.NET 6.0) #69294
    7.0.0
  • Environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables returns a new string when no substitution is made #69293
  • SerialPinChange.ToString() returns an integer value #69290
  • Test failure LibraryImportGenerator.UnitTests.Compiles.ValidateSnippetsFallbackForwarder(source: \"\\r\\nusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;\\r\\nusing\"..., targetFramework: Framework, expectFallbackForwarder: True) #69289
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Understanding codegen behavior around ref and struct locals #69321
  • [API Proposal]: Add RuntimeFeature field to identify support for numeric IntPtr type #67966
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds #60190
    7.0.0
  • SkipUseReferenceAssembly=true in ProjectReference is giving VS trouble to resolve some APIs #59390
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] verify template javascript files don't include signatures #69288
    7.0.0
  • Support DateOnly and TimeOnly in JsonSerializer #53539
    7.0.0
  • There is no easy way to create an isolated dotnet installation #2948
    Future
  • Incorrect stub generated by the LibraryImportGenerator when pinning is used #69018
    7.0.0
  • Crypto.Xml DSA tests need to not generate keys on macOS #20575
    Future
  • Creating System.Uri with a relative Uri works on Linux and not Windows, without the `UriKind` enum provided #69308
  • Native AOT publishes unused files #69312
  • clrgc.dll does not contain version info #69275
    7.0.0
  • Can't install dotnet-runtime-6.0 (6.0.5) on debian bullseye #69146
  • Is .NET7 NativeAOT Support wpf, winform and other cross platform UI framework? #69305
  • [NativeAOT] Not using ICU on Windows by default #68889
  • JIT: Why increment so slow with others operations? #69055
  • [QUIC] Don't use GetParam to get stream ID #69070
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support optional parameters in external methods #65670
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix OnFrameCall for methods on variable values #65707
  • AssemblyName.GetPublicKeyToken() may return byte[160] instead of byte[8] #69153
    7.0.0
  • `AssemblyName.FullName` doesn't show `PublicKeyToken` portion when the `AssemblyName` instance is returned from `AssemblyName.GetAssemblyName` #66785
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Use more specific types in Interop.WideCharToMultiByte signature #69338
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1770798 #69337
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve Interop.Sys.ReadLink loop with stackalloc #69335
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix memory leak at AssemblyLoadContext unload #69334
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Use intrinsic for genLog2() #69333
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make json source generation cancellable #69332
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Ensure non-numeric types don't implement the numeric only generic math interfaces #69331
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Allow source generation for init-only props with JsonIgnore #69327
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add integer type discriminator support in STJ polymorphism #69326
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Fix parsing the 'nunbox-arbitrary-trampolines' aot argument. #69319
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add more char.Is* helpers for common ASCII sets #69318
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Initial plumbing for JsonTypeInfoResolver #69316
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Do not print anything to stderr running SCD app without deps.json #69314
    area-Host
  • [wasm][debugger] Added null safety on EvaluateOnFrame #69307
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add OpenTelemetry with Geneva exporter to NetCoreServer used for testing #69304
    area-System.Net
  • [mono] Fix a crash during stack trace construction if a this object i… #69292
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: redundant branch destructure dominating and/or #69291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Expose the `RuntimeFeature.NumericIntPtr` member for C# 11 #69322
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • enable NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds #69264
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Do not sign the .js files #69317
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use static abstract members on two occasions. #69278
    community-contribution
  • Fix a typo #69145
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add DateOnly and TimeOnly support to System.Text.Json #69160
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Get StreamID while still in the MsQuic callback #69301
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix handling of custom type marshaller pinning with a different type than the native type. #69214
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Update LibraryImportGenerator unit tests with interpolated string arguments #69285
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement
  • Remove ActiveIssue for S.S.C.Xml tests that rely on DSA key generation #69287
    area-System.Security
  • Add versioning info to clrgc #69295
    area-GC-coreclr
  • fix typo in LoggerFactoryExtensions #69303
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Enable System.Globalization.Native for NativeAOT #69297
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • #49936 fixed Text.Json failures on x86 android #69248
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Share code between source-generated and built-in marshallers #69043
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Add regex test that reuses RegexMatchTests data for captures #69252
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Methods on primitives 65707 #66654
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Substitute GT_RET_EXPR in inline candidate arguments #69117
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Deadlock mitigation for debugging #69121
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • Support Requires on type in NativeAot #68978
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Use PopCount in DriveInfoInternal.Windows.cs. #69279
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add missing (uint) cast in regex generated code #69198
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Normalize Nil PublicKeyToken to an empty array #69169
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Convert RsaPaddingProcessor to statics #68749
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm] Misc debugger improvements #68988
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Collect more info for host tests #69282
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [wasm] First attempt at a wasm app host #68696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Address some System.Formats.Tar TODOs (infra and syscalls) #69107
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Test fix for GetMemberWithSameMetadataDefinitionAs #69284
    area-System.Reflection
  • Avoid unnecessary or duplicate PackageReferences - 7.0 Preview4 SDK work #69260
  • Add Stream ReadAtLeast and ReadExactly #69272
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove most usages of *wprintf* family of functions #68237
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Do not fold mismatched `OBJ(ADDR(LCL_VAR))` #69271
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [RyuJIT] Emit shlx, sarx, shrx on x64 #67182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] improve I64 memory access #64845
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Allow the inliner to substitute for small arguments #69068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding Int128 and UInt128 with a base software implementation #69204
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Always morph GT_MOD for ARM64 #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [MONO][DRAFT] Factor marshal-lightweight out of marshal-ilgen #69208
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][interp] Add tiering within interpreter #68823
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • support only Ordinal comparison inside WildcardPathSegment #69079
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • WIP: CoreCLR support for default interface implementation of static virtual methods #66887
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Prevent debugger deadlock with code versioning logic #68367
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Fix incremental XxHash32/XxHash64 #69185
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Start morphing `TYP_STRUCT` local indirections in `LocalAddressVisitor` #68515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Workaround crash in Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native #68990
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • Improve some use of Regex #68961
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [mono][eventpipe] Write primitive types and UTF-16 strings in little endian order #68648
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • [mono][eventpipe] Implementing MethodDetails and BulkType events #68571
    area-Tracing-mono
  • remove internal socket exception from NameResolution #69270
    area-System.Net
  • StreamReader sync/async optimizations: ArrayPool, IndexOfAny, ValueStringBuilder #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • WIP: [Mono] Fix initial 4244 warnings. #69236
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Deleting field sequences from `LCL_FLD` and `VNF_PtrToArrElem` #68986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle "mis-sized" structs in XARCH `PUTARG_STK` codegen #68611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement constant-folding for `VNF_BitCast` #68979
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm-ep] Minimal diagnostic tracing configuration and sample #69158
    arch-wasm, area-System.Diagnostics-mono
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Clear `NO_CSE` on struct addresses in `MorphCommaBlock` #69210
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][llvm] More LLVM 14.x changes. #69239
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Extract the main run loop from DevToolsClient, and #69219
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Refactor: narrow down SdbHelper responsibility #66821
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.9 #68765
    area-Build-mono
  • Display parents' members on GetProperties. #68907
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Fix HTTP3 stress #69182
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add AppContext data support for DefaultMaxConnectionsPerServer #68952
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Wasm conditional audit #69283
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [draft] [wasm] JS Marshaler based on code-gen and [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Merge several version of MsQuicStream SendAsync code #68772
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Redhawk to NativeAOT #69227
    community-contribution
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #67389
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add comment about PipeReader.ReadAtLeastAsync(0) #69217
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, needs-author-action
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • ARM64 - Add GT_CHK_DIV_BY_ZERO #69170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet.exe` detects paths twice #25423
  • `dotnet test` fails to launch `DumpMinitool*.exe` because it is a DLL - doesn't produce dump for process of different architecture #25421
  • Exclude entire packages from single-file #25411
  • .NET CLI: Allow to specify multiple packages at once `dotnet add package <package1> <package2> <package3> ..` #25396

Closed

  • NU1505 appears in 17.3.0 Preview 1 #25387

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove transitive dependencies for System.Private.Uri #25420
    Area-Workloads
  • Remove transitive dependencies for System.Private.Uri #25419
    Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #25409
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25403
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable signature checks in the package downloader #25395
    Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Always detect if SelfContained was specified by the user #25367
    Servicing-approved, Area-NetSDK, 6.0.3xx
  • Servicing F# #25325
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Feature band fallback with workload update #24678
    Area-Workloads
  • Switch the last non-helix test over to running on helix. #25324
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1770620 #25346
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cache pipeline inputs when suppressed: #24928
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Support suppressing transitive framework reference downloads, and other changes #25358
  • Support PublicKey metadata on InternalsVisibleTo #25000
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable the 4.8.1 target in sdk style projects #25393
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded net5.0 to the current framework #24787
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Check if publishaot is used #25323

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "throw expression" (C# 7.0) #62
    7.0
  • Champion "expression-bodied everything" (C# 7.0) #63
    7.0
  • Champion "discards" (C# 7.0) #422
    7.0
  • Champion "out var" (C# 7.0) #60
    7.0
  • Champion "tuples" (C# 7.0, VB 15.0) #59
    7.0
  • Champion "ref returns" (C# 7.0) #58
    7.0
  • Champion "Local Functions" (C# 7.0) #56
    7.0
  • Champion "Binary Literals" and "Digit Separators" (C# 7.0) #55
    7.0
  • Champion "Auto-Implemented Property Field-Targeted Attributes" (15.7) #42
    7.3
  • Champion "Private protected" (C# 7.2, VB 15.5) #37
    7.2
  • Champion "Improved overload candidates" (15.7) #98
    7.3
  • [Proposal]: Roles and extensions #5497
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update default-interface-methods.md #6124

Updated

  • Describe generic lifetimes and a proposed mapping for new syntax #6116

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Smart string escape on paste broken with line copy/paste #61316
  • Extremely high OOP memory usage #61314
  • It looks like the "implement interface explicitly" option doesn't spit out static modifier for static events and properties. #61311
    17.3
  • The compiler should not report CS8347 when there is no danger of escape #61296
    Compiler.Next

Closed

  • InvalidCastException from embedded language bits #61270
    17.3
  • Improve sig info, error message formatting when working with complex generic code #53061
    Backlog
  • Signature info gets incomprehensible in presence of extension methods, generics and tuples #33609
    Backlog
  • [LSP] Filtering completion items for methods also filters delegates #60755
    17.3
  • The classes listed by the C# overrides glyph should be sorted by their depth in the class hierarchy. #58219
    17.3
  • .editorconfig does not have the ability to warn if a function is too long, or if the number of characters in a line exceeds 80 characters. #61021
  • Implement interface fixer doesn't spit out `static` modifier implementations of static members #53925
    17.0.P2
  • Records with `;` body break references to members from record attribute #60379
    17.3
  • IDE0060 Attribute Suppression is causing IDE0079 #61142
  • IDE0055 report incorrectly on region define in pragma #61163
  • Fade-out of unused variables or parameters and dark theme #61185
  • CrossAssemblySupportingAndNotSupportingCovariantReturns test throws if `GetEmitDiagnostics` call added #60060
    Compiler.Next
  • Assertion hit in `SyntheticBoundNodeFactory.Convert` #61284
    17.3
  • More user-friendly error when writing `unchecked` to declare an unchecked user-defined operator #61305
  • Source generators and different versions of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Common #60702
  • C# refactor "Create and assign property" does not add appropriate white spaces around the assignment operator '=' #58750
    Backlog
  • Comment block conflicts with string content #61168
  • New Rename UI doesn't auto-focus #60035
    17.3
  • Using a more verbose qualification of the identifier of the return type of a property results in name conflict-related errors #61171
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable smart copy/paste when line-copy is involved. #61317
    Area-IDE
  • Change VB language version Roslyn.sln uses to "latest" #61313
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [semi-auto-props]: Rename ContainsFieldKeyword, revise cases that should handle FieldKeywordBackingField #61310
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Parse `unchecked` gracefully in operators #61309
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Add missing node state transition #61308
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Show not keyword (and all other stuff) after and & or when they are treated as identifiers #61306
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Avoid caching indentation data that changes over time #61304
    Area-IDE
  • Remove parameter null-checking from the Language Feature Status list #61302
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Highlight the search term in the options page #61301
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61294
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Add an UWP OptProf test for IDE #61315
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix crash when a multi-line raw literal becomes a skipped token. #61312
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #61300
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Fix several LSP completion kind mappings #61243
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Enable add usings on paste by default #61299
    Area-IDE, Next
  • More SyntaxContext sharing among CompletionProviders #61221
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Relax assertion in SyntheticBoundNodeFactory.Convert #61287
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Use SegmentedHashSet<T> to eliminate LOH allocations in AsyncBatchingWorkQueue #61276
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update dependency versions for 4.2.0 publishing #61265
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix focus on rename UI opening #60846
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #61297
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Update PublishData.json with new package #61298
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Remove Razor and editor inference document option providers #61091
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61295
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Revert "Revert "Improve editorconfig options caching on ProjectState"" #61283
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove eng/docker/mono.sh script #61292
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix nested in generic type binding issues in enabled nullability context #61182
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next

Updated

  • Test the EditorFeatures layer on net472 and net6.0-windows #61234
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Add JSON semantic token classifications #61231
    Area-IDE
  • ✨ Implement ImmutableSegmentedHashSet<T> #54719
    Area-Compilers
  • Add pointer for `AnalysisLevel` to warning waves doc #61196
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Add support for CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #61113
    Area-Compilers
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Bump macos workload to RC3 #61250
    Area-IDE
  • WIP: Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • Add new line before 'where' constraints in Quick Info #60545
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Make static respect modifier order #61289
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [LSP] Support LSP services associated with LSP server instances (with lifetimes that match). #61266
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • Allow creating SourceText from a StringBuilder #61251
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Unify nint and IntPtr #60913
    Area-Compilers, 17.3
  • Allow skeletons to be reused in frozen-partial scenarios (for inheritance margin) #61286
    Area-IDE
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove document options provider #61228
    Area-IDE
  • Skip timing test #61222
    Area-Compilers, Disabled Test
  • Add new collapsing option for metadata files that contain source #61205
    Area-IDE, Blocked, Need Design Review
  • Add support for frozen-partial projects, and have skeleton assemblies work effectively for them #61282
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Standalone Webassembly - Unable to configure multiple IdP with Azure AD #41682
  • Hot reload for Blazor Web Assembly in VS 17.2.0 does not work #41681
  • Detect public properties that will fail when databinding a SelectList #41680
  • Undocumented breaking changes .NET 5 => .NET 6 #41679
  • Dynamic Cookie.Domain in cookie middleware #41678
  • Signlar 1006 error on win 2016 server when message size incresed #41675
  • [SignalR] Client keepalive check is disabled when I debug my hub server #41673

Closed

  • OpenAPI Client Generator, Generating multiple clients named same thing. #41627
  • WebAPI template Swagger API versioning support #41643
  • Kestrel host throws null exception when writing response #41416
  • RedisCache - Add options with key prefix #41677
  • Unintuitive/incorrect behaviour from use of WithOpenApi() #41623
  • Error with Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation after updating to 6.0.4/6.0.5 #41642
  • appcmd.exe is not reading appsettings from appsettings.json #41676
  • Specific components for dealing with large binary data (files and media) #30290
  • staticwebassets.runtime.json also includes files from referenced RCL NuGet package #40317
  • TaskCancelledException is swallowed in Blazor WebAssembly #41674
  • Improving DataProtection linkability #41411
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Results.ValidationProblem not including errors in response #41634
    7.0-preview5
  • Perf improvement: caching, caching #41526
  • Kestrel WebSocket AcceptWebSocketAsync NRE #41602

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable trim analyzer #41683
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • HELIX failures investigations #41563
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview5
  • Remove temporary allocations in Session and Identity #41671
    Perf, 7.0-preview5
  • Refactor DataProtection trimming #41650
    area-dataprotection, 7.0-preview5
  • Using WriteJsonAsync<object?> operation for ProblemHttpResult #41670
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #41612
    area-infrastructure, 5.0.x

Updated

  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.6
  • Improve gRPC JSON transcoding request binding and support HttpBody #41523
    area-grpc
  • Fix templates sourceName & port of template fixes from main #41536
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 6.0.6
  • Changed the Rate Limiter API to action-based #41657

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Image is clipped during animation #7182
  • Path as content for a ContentView ControlTemplate crashes on all platforms #7181
  • CarouselView Shows All Items at Once in Windows #7180
  • [Mac] MAUI app targeting net6.0-maccatalyst crashes if some NuGets are referenced. #7179
  • MacCatalyst currently doesn't surface unhandled exceptions in user code so we should help MAUI users out #7176
  • RC3 iOS AppCenter Dependency on System.Windows.Forms 4.0.0 crashes App #7175
  • iOS PageRenderer compatibility not rendering page content #7174
  • WinUI Shell does not consistently react to shell structure changes #7171
    6.0.300-servicing
  • WindowsForms with BlazorWebView control throws error in evergreen runtime using version 6.0.300-rc.3.5667 #7169
  • [Mac] MAUI Project doesn't build with classlib referenced #7163
  • Responsive FlyoutBehavior #7161
  • Can menu bar set in Caption\Title Bar? #7160
  • Get error details for WebView failed navigation #7159
  • [Windows] [Scenario Day] Wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #7156
  • [Windows] [Scenario Day] Shell SearchBarHandler only show the first item and and not correctly #7155
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Windows] [Scenario Day] Frame is cutted at the bottom on Windows #7154
  • [Android] Updating MainPage with a NavigationPage does not display page content #7153
  • Framework for audio playback #7152
  • [Windows] [Scenario Day] CollectionView EmptyView using View not appear #7151
  • [Windows] [Scenario Day] EmptyView using Template displayed at the same time as the content #7150
  • [Windows] [Scenario Day] Scroll by Object not working the first time #7149
  • [Windows] [Scenario Day] ScrollTo not works the first time #7148
  • [Windows] [Scenario Day] CollectionView not resizing if resize Windows #7147
  • [Windows] [Scenario Day] Dynamic sizing CollectionView items not working #7146
  • [Windows] [Scenario Day] Crash using ScrollTo with a grouped ListView #7145
  • [Windows] [Scenario Day] IndicatorView using templated icons not working #7144
  • Maui Blazor Hot Reload Not Working With CSS Isolation Files #7142
  • [Android] [Scenario Day] TableView not respond to Theme changes #7141
  • Content inside a Frame layout is not visible. #7139
  • [Scenario Day] Picker SelectedIndex property not working #7138
  • [Android] [ScenarioDay] The default size of SearchBar is wrong, it does not fill the space #7137
  • [Android] [ScenarioDay] The Switch control defaults aligned to right #7136
  • [Scenario Day] Some colors of the default styles of Templates do not seem correct #7135
  • On Android systems, the OnSizeAllocated method is triggered with wrong width and height values. #7134
  • [Scenario Day] Hot Reload not working updating styles using AppThemeBinding #7133
  • [Tooling] [Scenario Day] XAML Live Preview not update selection #7132
  • Label content alignment is not proper when it has span elements. #7131
  • [Android] CornerRadius ignores density #7130
    6.0.300-servicing
  • SVG images with inner styles shows are incorrect #7129
  • Button/ImageButton has space between button and border in its corner #7128
  • Button/ImageButton Opacity property affect full button #7124
  • Title bar still not behaving correctly... #7123
  • Wrong rendering of Grid cell content #7122
    6.0.300-servicing

Closed

  • Can no longer build for iOS, getting error: clang++ exited with code 1 #7113
  • CollectionView ItemSizingStrategy on Android, causes app to exit on startup #7097
  • CarouselView Swiping Disrupted When in Shell #7177
  • Using SkiaSharp with Maui crashes the app on Android in Release #7037
    6.0.300
  • IImage.ResizeImage() always disposes of bitmap on Android #7125
  • FlyoutItem disappear when Shell.FlyoutFooterTemplate is present #7164
  • Backwards navigation is not triggering ApplyQueryAttributes #6817
    6.0.300-servicing
  • RC3 MauiIcon MauiSplashScreen svg are black when using <style type="text/css"> #7115
  • Maui NET ios app error when trying to create ipa file #6866
    6.0.300-servicing
  • macOS SecKeyChain #7126
  • GraphicsView's PanGestureRecognizer not working on Windows #6173
    6.0.300-servicing
  • On iOS, Button.Clicked does not get called when button is tapped. #7127
  • Grid within Border doesn't obey HorizontalOptions #5752
    6.0.300

PullRequests
